## Second page

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```


## Third page

Let us look at a simple code.

```{r}
# This is an example of a simple R code that generates a sequence of numbers and computes their sum
numbers <- 1:5
sum_numbers <- sum(numbers)

# Output the sum
sum_numbers
```
